verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w does|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* surpass \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w branch|strong="H2156"\w* among \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*?

\w Can|strong="H6213"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w be|strong="H6086"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w something|strong="H3605"\w* useful? \w Or|strong="H4480"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w peg|strong="H3489"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H6086"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w hang|strong="H8518"\w* \w utensils|strong="H3627"\w*?

\w No|strong="H5414"\w*, \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* fire \w for|strong="H5414"\w* fuel. \w The|strong="H5414"\w* fire devours \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w ends|strong="H7098"\w*, \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w charred|strong="H2787"\w*. \w Can|strong="H8147"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w useful|strong="H6743"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w anything|strong="H4399"\w*?

\w Even|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w whole|strong="H8549"\w*, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* could \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* useful. \w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w much|strong="H6213"\w* \w less|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* useful \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fire \w has|strong="H1961"\w* consumed \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w charred|strong="H2787"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*!

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Like|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*, \w which|strong="H6086"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* fire \w for|strong="H3427"\w* fuel, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3389"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. \w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w escaped|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire, \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w another|strong="H6440"\w* fire \w will|strong="H3068"\w* consume \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thus \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, \w because|strong="H3282"\w* \w they|strong="H3282"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w acted|strong="H4603"\w* \w unfaithfully|strong="H4604"\w*,’ \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*.”
